trait.name: Hold Breath
text: Othokent can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Skewer
text: Once per turn, when Othokent makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and Othokent gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Othokent makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Trident
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
